title: Best Skin Care Products & Routine for Your Skin Type | AVEENO®
description:
Finding the best skin care products for your skin type is important, and having a consistent skin care routine is key to keeping skin healthy and glowing, all day, every day.

AVEENO® provides 4 key skin care tips to get, and attain, clean, healthy skin.

First, cleansing for your skin type. For sensitive skin, using AVEENO® Ultra-Calming® Foaming Cleanser will help to calm dry, sensitive skin. For normal skin, using AVEENO® Positively Radiant Cleanser will keep skin in balance.

Second, apply any skin care treatments or medication, whether it is and acne treatment or scar treatment.

Third, seal in skin’s moisture with a hydrating moisturizer with SPF, like AVEENO® Positively Radiant Daily Moisturizer, which can also help improve the look of skin tone and texture, while providing necessary daily sun protection. 

Fourth, if you wear makeup during the day, make sure to remove makeup before bed with either makeup remover wipes like AVEENO® Ultra-Calming® Makeup Removing Wipes or with an appropriate face cleanser.

To learn more about AVEENO® products, visit: http://www.aveeno.com/category/our+products.do.

To get more skin care tips from AVEENO®, subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/user/aveeno.
